verses.verse: <S%H7692>Shiggaion<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7891>sang<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush<s%> the <S%H1145>Benjamite.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> in you do I put my <S%H2620>trust:<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me:
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> he <S%H2963>tear<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> like a <S%H738>lion,<s%> <S%H6561>rending<s%> it in pieces, while there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> there be <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands;<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> I have <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to him that was at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with me; (yes, I have <S%H2502>delivered<s%> him that <S%H7387>without<s%> <S%H7387>cause<s%> is my <S%H6887>enemy:<s%>)

Let the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H7291>persecute<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H5381>take<s%> it; yes, let him <S%H7429>tread<s%> down my <S%H2416>life<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7931>lay<s%> my <S%H3519>honor<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in your <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up yourself because of the <S%H5678>rage<s%> of my <S%H6887>enemies:<s%> and <S%H5782>awake<s%> for me to the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> that you have <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>
So shall the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3816>people<s%> <S%H5437>compass<s%> you about: for their <S%H5921>sakes<s%> therefore <S%H7725>return<s%> you on <S%H4791>high.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according to my <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and according to my <S%H8537>integrity<s%> that is in me.

<S%H4994>Oh<s%> let the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> come to an <S%H1584>end;<s%> but <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H6662>just:<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H974>tries<s%> the <S%H3826>hearts<s%> and <S%H3629>reins.<s%>
My <S%H4043>defense<s%> is of <S%H430>God,<s%> which <S%H3467>saves<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H2194>angry<s%> with the wicked <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H7725>turn<s%> not, he will <S%H3913>whet<s%> his <S%H2719>sword;<s%> he has <S%H1869>bent<s%> his <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and made it <S%H3559>ready.<s%>
He has also <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for him the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H4194>death;<s%> he <S%H6466>ordains<s%> his <S%H2671>arrows<s%> against the <S%H1814>persecutors.<s%>
He <S%H3738>made<s%> a <S%H953>pit,<s%> and <S%H2658>dig<s%> it, and is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> into the <S%H7845>ditch<s%> which he <S%H6466>made.<s%>
His <S%H5999>mischief<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head,<s%> and his <S%H2555>violent<s%> dealing shall <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on his own <S%H6936>pate.<s%>

I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> according to his <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> and will sing praise to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>high.<s%>
